text: Craig Lussi (born February 22, 1936) is an American skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1960 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:American male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of the United States Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1960 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Buffalo, New York
title: Craig Lussi
